name: Lew Rockwell Reader v0.2
description:
Makes the wonderful lewrockwell.com/blog a little easier and more modern looking. Amazing content found there deserves to be displayed with ease. I did what I could with the little I had available. Turns out the blog site is built with tables. Hopefully at some point they upgrade to WordPress or something equivalent! Either way enjoy!

Adds a grey background, slims up the reading area and switches up the font (still deciding which default to go with).
